{{TOC|right}}

{{About|the grouping of types of entities|grouping of individual entities|Scoreboard#Tags}}

An entity type [[Tag (Java Edition)|tag]] is a group of [[entity]] types. It can be used in [[Target selectors#Selecting targets by type|{{cd|type}} target selector arguments]] and loot table conditions with {{cd|#{{ph|resource location}}}}, which checks if the entity's type matches any of the entity types specified in the tag. Entity type tags are also used to control a number of other gameplay features; see below for the use of each tag.

== List of tags ==
=== accepts_iron_golem_gift ===
Entities in this tag can have poppies placed onto their head by iron golems.

{{tag_list|accepts_iron_golem_gift|type=entity_type
|copper_golem
}}

=== aquatic ===
Contains all aquatic mobs. Unused in vanilla aside from being used in other tags.

{{tag_list|aquatic|type=entity_type
|turtle
|axolotl
|guardian
|elder_guardian
|cod
|pufferfish
|salmon
|tropical_fish
|dolphin
|squid
|glow_squid
|tadpole
|nautilus
|zombie_nautilus
}}

=== arrows ===
Entities in this tag are affected by the [[Power]] and [[Punch]] enchantments.

Used by the advancement "[[Advancement#Take_Aim|Take Aim]]".

{{tag_list|arrows|type=entity_type
|arrow
|spectral_arrow
}}

=== arthropod ===
Contains all arthropod mobs. Unused in vanilla aside from being used in other tags.

{{tag_list|arthropod|type=entity_type
|bee
|endermite
|silverfish
|spider
|cave_spider
}}

=== axolotl_always_hostiles ===
Axolotls are always hostile toward entities in this tag.

{{tag_list|axolotl_always_hostiles|type=entity_type
|drowned
|guardian
|elder_guardian
}}

=== axolotl_hunt_targets ===
Axolotls exhibit the cooldown-based "hunt" behavior toward entities in this tag.

{{tag_list|axolotl_hunt_targets|type=entity_type
|tropical_fish
|pufferfish
|salmon
|cod
|squid
|glow_squid
|tadpole
}}

=== beehive_inhabitors ===
Entities in this tag can be in beehives.

{{tag_list|beehive_inhabitors|type=entity_type
|bee
}}

=== boat ===
Used by the advancement "[[Advancement#Whatever_Floats_Your_Goat!|Whatever Floats Your Goat!]]".

{{tag_list|boat|type=entity_type
|oak_boat
|spruce_boat
|birch_boat
|jungle_boat
|acacia_boat
|cherry_boat
|dark_oak_boat
|pale_oak_boat
|mangrove_boat
|bamboo_raft
}}

=== burn_in_daylight ===
Entities in this tag burn in direct sunlight. Wither skeletons remain unaffected due to being immune to fire.

{{tag_list|burn_in_daylight|type=entity_type
|skeleton
|stray
|wither_skeleton
|bogged
|zombie
|zombie_horse
|zombie_villager
|drowned
|zombie_nautilus
|phantom
}}

=== can_breathe_under_water ===
Entities in this tag cannot [[drown]] underwater.

{{tag_list|can_breathe_under_water|type=entity_type
|#undead
|axolotl
|frog
|guardian
|elder_guardian
|turtle
|glow_squid
|cod
|pufferfish
|salmon
|squid
|tropical_fish
|tadpole
|armor_stand
|copper_golem
|nautilus
}}

=== can_equip_harness ===
Entities in this tag can be equipped with a [[harness]].

Note: this does not mean that the Harness will function, just that it can be equipped into the body slot.

{{tag_list|can_equip_harness|type=entity_type
|happy_ghast
}}

=== can_equip_saddle ===
Entities in this tag can be equipped with a [[saddle]].

Note: this does not mean that the Saddle will function, just that it can be equipped into the saddle slot.

{{tag_list|can_equip_saddle|type=entity_type
|horse
|skeleton_horse
|zombie_horse
|donkey
|mule
|pig
|strider
|camel
|camel_husk
|nautilus
|zombie_nautilus
}}

=== can_float_while_ridden ===
Entities in this tag can float in water while being ridden by a player.

{{tag_list|can_float_while_ridden|type=entity_type
|horse
|zombie_horse
|mule
|donkey
|camel
|camel_husk
}}

=== can_turn_in_boats ===
Entities in this tag are not forced to face forward in boats.

{{tag_list|can_turn_in_boats|type=entity_type
|breeze
}}

=== can_wear_horse_armor ===
Entities in this tag can be equipped with [[horse armor]] in their body slot.

{{tag_list|can_wear_horse_armor|type=entity_type
|horse
|zombie_horse
}}

=== can_wear_nautilus_armor ===
Entities in this tag can be equipped with [[nautilus armor]] in their body slot.

{{tag_list|can_wear_nautilus_armor|type=entity_type
|nautilus
|zombie_nautilus
}}

=== candidate_for_iron_golem_gift ===
Iron golems will offer poppies to entities in this tag.

{{tag_list|candidate_for_iron_golem_gift|type=entity_type
|villager
|#accepts_iron_golem_gift
}}

=== cannot_be_pushed_onto_boats ===
Entities in this tag will not automatically enter boats when nearby enough.

{{tag_list|cannot_be_pushed_onto_boats|type=entity_type

|elder_guardian
|cod
|pufferfish
|salmon
|tropical_fish
|dolphin
|squid
|glow_squid
|tadpole
|creaking
|nautilus
|zombie_nautilus
}}

=== deflects_projectiles ===
Projectiles bounce off entities in this tag.

Breezes are hard-coded to still be vulnerable to wind charges despite their inclusion in this tag; if other entities are added to this tag, they will also deflect wind charges.

{{tag_list|deflects_projectiles|type=entity_type
|breeze
}}

Entities in this tag will force their riders to dismount when fully submerged.

{{tag_list|frog_food|type=entity_type
|slime

}}

=== ignores_poison_and_regen ===
For entities that cannot be affected by [[Poison]] and [[Regeneration]] effects.

{{tag_list|ignores_poison_and_regen|type=entity_type
|#undead
}}

=== illager ===
Contains all illager mobs. Unused in vanilla aside from being used in other tags.

{{tag_list|illager|type=entity_type
|evoker
|illusioner
|pillager
|vindicator
}}

=== illager_friends ===
Illagers consider entities in this tag to be allies, unless on a different [[team]].

{{tag_list|illager_friends|type=entity_type
|#illager
}}

=== immune_to_infested ===
Entities in this tag cannot be afflicted with the [[Infested]] effect.

{{tag_list|immune_to_infested|type=entity_type
|silverfish
}}

=== immune_to_oozing ===
Entities in this tag cannot be afflicted with the [[Oozing]] effect.

{{tag_list|immune_to_oozing|type=entity_type
|slime
}}

=== impact_projectiles ===
Entities in this tag can break chorus flowers and decorated pots when hit, provided they are capable of activating [[target]]s.

If removed from this tag, tridents additionally lose the ability to break pointed dripstone when hit.

{{tag_list|impact_projectiles|type=entity_type
|#arrows
|firework_rocket
|snowball
|fireball
|small_fireball
|egg
|trident
|dragon_fireball
|wither_skull
|wind_charge
|breeze_wind_charge
}}

=== inverted_healing_and_harm ===
Entities in this tag are healed by [[Instant Damage]] and harmed by [[Instant Health]].

{{tag_list|inverted_healing_and_harm|type=entity_type
|#undead
}}

=== nautilus_hostiles ===
[[Nautilus]]es and [[zombie nautilus]]es are hostile to entities in this tag.

{{tag_list|nautilus_hostiles|type=entity_type
|pufferfish
}}

=== no_anger_from_wind_charge ===
Entities in this tag do not retaliate if damaged by a [[wind charge]].

{{tag_list|no_anger_from_wind_charge|type=entity_type
|breeze
|skeleton
|bogged
|stray
|zombie
|husk
|spider
|cave_spider
|slime
}}

=== non_controlling_rider ===
Entities in this tag do not override the AI of entities they are riding.

{{tag_list|non_controlling_rider|type=entity_type
|slime
|magma_cube
}}

=== not_scary_for_pufferfish ===
Entities in this tag do not cause nearby pufferfish to inflate.

{{tag_list|not_scary_for_pufferfish|type=entity_type

|guardian
|elder_guardian
|cod
|pufferfish
|salmon
|tropical_fish

|squid
|glow_squid
|tadpole

Entities in this tag can walk on top of powder snow without sinking.

{{tag_list|powder_snow_walkable_mobs|type=entity_type

|silverfish
|fox
}}

=== raiders ===
Entities in this tag gain the [[Glowing]] effect when a bell is rung, and do not override a ravager's AI when riding one.

Used in the advancement "[[Advancement#Voluntary_Exile|Voluntary Exile]]".

{{tag_list|raiders|type=entity_type
|evoker
|pillager
|ravager
|vindicator
|illusioner
|witch
}}

=== redirectable_projectile ===
Projectile entities in this tag get reflected by left clicking them.

{{tag_list|redirectable_projectile|type=entity_type
|fireball
|wind_charge
|breeze_wind_charge
}}

=== sensitive_to_bane_of_arthropods ===
Entities in this tag are affected by the [[Bane of Arthropods]] enchantment.

{{tag_list|sensitive_to_bane_of_arthropods|type=entity_type
|#arthropod
}}

=== sensitive_to_impaling ===
Entities in this tag are affected by the [[Impaling]] enchantment.

{{tag_list|sensitive_to_impaling|type=entity_type
|#aquatic
}}

=== sensitive_to_smite ===
Entities in this tag are affected by the [[Smite]] enchantment.

{{tag_list|sensitive_to_smite|type=entity_type
|#undead
}}

=== skeletons ===
Used in the '{{mono|entities/creeper.json}}' loot table to determine whether a [[music disc]] should drop.

{{tag_list|skeletons|type=entity_type
|skeleton
|stray
|wither_skeleton
|skeleton_horse
|bogged
|parched
}}

=== undead ===
Armadillos roll up if entities in this tag are nearby.

{{tag_list|undead|type=entity_type
|#skeletons
|#zombies
|wither
|phantom
}}

=== wither_friends ===
Entities in this tag are not targeted by and cannot hurt [[wither]]s.

{{tag_list|wither_friends|type=entity_type
|#undead
}}

=== zombies ===
Contains all zombie mobs. Unused in vanilla aside from being used in other tags.

|zombie_horse
|camel_husk
|zombie
|zombie_villager
|zombified_piglin
|zoglin
|drowned
|husk
|zombie_nautilus
}}

=== axolotl_tempted_hostiles ===
Replaced with {{tag link|entity_type|axolotl_always_hostiles}}.

Version added: [[Java Edition 20w51a|20w51a]]. Version removed: [[Java Edition 21w13a|21w13a]].

{{tag_list|axolotl_tempted_hostiles|type=entity_type
|drowned
|guardian
}}

=== deflects_arrows ===
Replaced with {{tag link|entity_type|deflects_projectiles}}.

Version added: [[Java Edition 23w45a|23w45a]]. Version removed: [[Java Edition 24w03a|24w03a]].

{{tag_list|deflects_arrows|type=entity_type
|breeze
}}

=== deflects_tridents ===
Replaced with {{tag link|entity_type|deflects_projectiles}}

Version added: [[Java Edition 23w45a|23w45a]]. Version removed: [[Java Edition 24w03a|24w03a]].

{{tag_list|deflects_tridents|type=entity_type
|breeze
}}
